application-form-type.required: Select how you are applying for your low THC cannabis licence

amend-application-details.numeric: Application reference number must not include letters a to z or special characters
amend-application-details.minlength: Application reference number must be between 2 and 8 numeral characters
amend-application-details.maxlength: Application reference number must be between 2 and 8 numeral characters

licensee-type.required: Select what type of low THC cannabis licensee you are

company-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
company-name.maxlength: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters
company-name.minlength: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters

company-number.companyNumber: Enter a real company number, like 16850062

telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

website-url.maxlength: Website URL must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
licence-holder-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
licence-holder-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-town-or-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
licence-holder-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters

growing-location-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
growing-location-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters

growing-location-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
growing-location-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

growing-location-town-or-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
growing-location-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters

growing-location-uk-telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

site-responsible-person-full-name.required: Enter the name of the responsible person for the site
site-responsible-person-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
site-responsible-person-full-name.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
site-responsible-person-full-name.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

site-responsible-person-uk-telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

site-responsible-DBS-check.required: You must confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

responsible-person-dbs-fullname.required: Enter the name of the responsible person as it appears on the DBS certificate
responsible-person-dbs-fullname.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
responsible-person-dbs-fullname.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
responsible-person-dbs-fullname.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

responsible-person-dbs-reference.required: Enter a DBS reference, for example a certificate number or an application reference number
responsible-person-dbs-reference.maxlength: DBS reference must be between 3 and 25 characters
responsible-person-dbs-reference.minlength: DBS reference must be between 3 and 25 characters
responsible-person-dbs-reference.alphanum: Enter a real DBS certificate number or application reference number

responsible-person-dbs-date-of-issue.required: Enter the DBS date of issue or application for the responsible person
responsible-person-dbs-date-of-issue.date: Enter a real date of issue or application
responsible-person-dbs-date-of-issue.before: DBS date of issue or application must not be in the future
responsible-person-dbs-date-of-issue.after: DBS certificates cannot be more than 3 years old. This person must apply for a new DBS certificate

responsible-officer-dbs-subscription.required: Select if the responsible person has subscribed to DBS updates

witness-destruction-plant.required: Select if you need someone to be authorised to witness the destruction of the plant

how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.required: Enter how the leaves and flowers will be destroyed
how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.maxlength: Details of how the leaves and flowers will be destroyed must be 2,000 characters or less
how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

why-new-licence.required: Select why you are requesting a new licence

moving-site-date.date: Enter a moving date in the correct format
moving-site-date.after: Moving date must be in the future

is-contractual-agreement.required: Select if the new site is part of a contractual agreement

authorised-witness-full-name.required: Enter the name of the authorised witness
authorised-witness-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
authorised-witness-full-name.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
authorised-witness-full-name.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

authorised-witness-uk-telephone.required: Enter a UK telephone number for the authorised witness
authorised-witness-uk-telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

authorised-witness-email.required: Enter an email address for the authorised witness

authorise-witness-DBS-check.required: You must confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.required: Enter the name of the authorised witness as it appears on the DBS certificate
authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

authorised-witness-dbs-reference.required: Enter a DBS reference, for example a certificate number or an application reference number
authorised-witness-dbs-reference.maxlength: DBS reference must be between 3 and 25 characters
authorised-witness-dbs-reference.minlength: DBS reference must be between 3 and 25 characters
authorised-witness-dbs-reference.alphanum: Enter a real DBS certificate number or application reference number

authorised-witness-dbs-date-of-issue.required: Enter the DBS date of issue or application for the authorised witness
authorised-witness-dbs-date-of-issue.date: Enter a real date of issue or application
authorised-witness-dbs-date-of-issue.before: DBS date of issue or application must not be in the future
authorised-witness-dbs-date-of-issue.after: DBS certificates cannot be more than 3 years old. This person must apply for a new DBS certificate

authorised-witness-dbs-subscription.required: Select if the authorised witness has subscribed to DBS updates

hold-other-regulatory-licences.required: Select if you hold any Home Office or other regulatory licenses

other-licence-type.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
other-licence-type.maxlength: Licence type must be between 3 and 200 characters
other-licence-type.minlength: Licence type must be between 3 and 200 characters

other-licence-number.maxlength: Licence number must be between 3 and 25 characters
other-licence-number.minlength: Licence number must be between 3 and 25 characters
other-licence-number.alphanum: Enter a real licence number or application reference number

other-licence-date-of-issue.required: Enter the date of issue or application
other-licence-date-of-issue.date: Enter a real date of issue or application
other-licence-date-of-issue.before: Other licence date of issue or application must not be in the future
other-licence-date-of-issue.after: Other licence cannot be more than 10 years old.

is-licence-refused.required: Select if your organisation ever been refused a licence

refusal-reason.required: Enter details of why you were refused a licence
refusal-reason.maxlength: Details of why you were refused a licence must be 2,000 characters or less
refusal-reason.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
